recipesJson.name: PB HAZE
recipesJson.author: NastyNate
recipesJson.description: This is a creamy Peanut butter hazelnut custard/ice cream topped with crushed graham cracker giving it that nice smooth nutty cream inhale and a light graham/ crumb texture on the exhale.

reviews.text: Love this mix!  It's nice and rich but stops shy of being real custardy, and gives me that PB I crave.  I take the TPA PB up a bit, and add a little Flavorah PB for that gritty nuttiness.  I enjoy this a SnV.  Well done!
